MathURL and MathJax

08 Feb 2018

I love how I can add Math equations in Markup using MathJax. Another tool that provides easy LaTeX translation is MathURL.

My template includes:

\begin{align} \label{a} f : \mathbb{R}^n \rightarrow \mathbb{R}^m \end{align} The equation \ref{a} states that $n$-dimensional real coordinate space is mapped to $m$-dimensional real coordinate space.

$…\textrm{normal text}…$
